name: Chutes AI ask
description: Create a domain specific assistant using Chutes instead of OpenRouter

preferences.name: Chutes API Key
preferences.description: You can get one at https://chutes.ai/app/api

preferences.name: OpenRouter chat completion model
preferences.description: For model names see https://chutes.ai/app, navigate to the model you want to use, click API and use the model name given.

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: A prompt to give some context to the system. This is optional but highly recommended.
preferences.default_value: Shortest possible neutral response to carve into stone tablet. Very terse with essentials only.

preferences.name: Line Length
preferences.description: The maximum number of characters per line.
